name: Ghostwire
desc: Recon has no time limit. Chips cost 1g less (min 0).

name: Overclocker
desc: Tier-ups cost 3 less. Start at T2. Units have -2 HP (min 1).

name: Echo Protocol
desc: First unit bought each round gets +1/+1. 4th buy each round is free.
flavor: First signal is always the strongest.

name: Phantom Root
desc: Start with -10 HP, +10 gold. +1 bonus gold per round.

name: Neon Broker
desc: Shop has +2 extra slots. Rerolls are FREE.

name: Killswitch
desc: All Deadswitch effects trigger twice. Quest rewards +50% gold bonus.

name: Data Miner
desc: After combat, discover 1 unit from your current tier. Free to take.
flavor: The network provides for those who listen.

name: Ironclad
desc: All units start combat with Shield = 15% of their max HP.
flavor: Every soldier gets a second skin.

name: Chrome Dealer
desc: Hold 2 extra Breaches. Breach choices always include Glitch Market.

name: Surge
desc: On win, strongest unit gets +2/+2 permanently. Win streak bonus doubled.

name: Hard Reset
desc: Selling returns +1g. Bench +2 slots. Selling triggers free shop reroll.

name: Glitch Matrix
desc: When applying a Protocol Chip, 40% chance to refund its full cost.
